subject: Data
title: How Propaganda Uses Statistics
description: A quick win: understand How Propaganda Uses Statistics.

hook.text: The Soviet Union reported 100% employment, 100% literacy, and 100% voter turnout. All were technically 'true.'

buildup.text: Authoritarian regimes use real-sounding statistics to create an illusion of prosperity and legitimacy.

discovery.text: They manipulate definitions: 'employed' includes forced labor. 'Literate' means signing your name.

twist.text: Modern propaganda is subtler. Cherry-picked economic data and rigged surveys serve the same purpose.

climax.text: Statistics without independent verification can be weapons of control, not tools of understanding.

punchline.text: Numbers from power are power's numbers.

quiz.question: How do authoritarian regimes misuse statistics?
options: They manipulate definitions to make bad data look impressive
